title: New: Grace Lightman – Repair Repair
content:
There’s such a glorious nostalgia to Grace Lightman’s music that comes across as so effortlessly elegant.

Her latest offering, Repair Repair, yet again showcases her silky smooth vocal and her knack for penning addictive, slightly unorthodox but undoubtedly brilliant tracks. Perhaps her most outwardly ‘pop’ to date, there’s a real 70’s vibe to Repair Repair, almost feeling Kraftwerk influenced at points. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
